novel distant supervised relation extrac.from sentence: In this paper , we propose RESIDE , a novel distant supervised relation extraction method which utilizes additional supervision from KB through its neural network based architecture .

RESIDE.from sentence: RESIDE makes principled use of entity type and relation alias information from KBs , to impose soft constraints while predicting the relation .

encoded syntactic information.from sentence: It uses encoded syntactic information obtained from Graph Convolution Networks ( GCN ) , along with embedded side information , to improve neural relation extraction .
